mapper.select: select * from tb_cluster_account_udsc tcau left join tb_cluster_game_account tcga on tcau.taskid = tcga.id left join tb_cluster_game tcg on tcga.game_id = tcg.id where tcau.udid = #{udid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
